title: Dave Butz, All-Pro Defensive Lineman for Washington, Dies at 72
description: He was a member of two Super Bowl-winning teams in the 1980s and recorded 64 sacks in his 16-year career.
dc:creator: The Associated Press
media:description: Dave Butz in 1975. He was chosen as one of the Washington organizationâ€™s 90 greatest players this year when the team commemorated its 90th anniversary.
